modes.label: Select Vibe Check
modes.single_tooltip: One file at a time. Main character energy only.
modes.batch_tooltip: Yeet an entire folder of NPCs at once. Mass ratio.

gaslight.label: Gaslight Files
gaslight.tooltip: Overwrite existing output files instead of skipping them.

ghost.label: Ghost Mode üëª
ghost.tooltip: Make watermark go poof (transparent). Sigma move for LoRA training - just enable alpha masking in your trainer. PNG/WEBP only, no cap.

sigma_detect.label: Sigma Threshold
sigma_detect.tooltip: Max watermark size as % of image. Detections larger than this will be skipped.

detection_prompt.label: Rizz Prompt
detection_prompt.tooltip: What are we hunting? Try: watermark, logo, text, cringe, etc.

output_format.label: Final Drip
output_format.tooltip: Pick your output drip. Auto = let him cook the original format.

detection_skip.label: Lazy Mode (Skip)
detection_skip.hint: Higher = faster processing, but might miss short watermarks.

fade_in.label: Pre-Game Buffer
fade_in.hint: Extend removal backwards in time (for fading in watermarks).

fade_out.label: End-Game Buffer
fade_out.hint: Extend removal forwards in time (for fading out watermarks).

buttons.preview_tooltip: Scout the opps before yeeting. Shows hitboxes on detected targets.

marquee: NO CAP /// SKIBIDI BOP MM DADA /// WATERMARK GONE WRONG /// FANUM TAX EVASION /// GRIMACE SHAKE /// ONLY IN OHIO /// LEVEL 10 GYATT /// RIZZ GOD ///

logs.first_run_hint: (Downloading big brain AI - let him cook)
logs.ghost_video_warning: Ghost Mode broke the skibidi. Turning it off.
logs.api_error: API is dead. Skill issue. Run batch file.
